title: Dashboard Critical Fixes + Playwright Testing
description: Fix dashboard tab switching and data loading issues, implement Playwright test suite

tasks.details: Debug and fix tab navigation - tabs not clickable, investigate JavaScript issues
Debug data not loading in dashboard, check WebSocket connections and API endpoints
Create comprehensive Playwright tests for tab switching, data loading, and UI interactions
Create automated health checks for dashboard functionality

deliverables: Working dashboard with functional tab switching
Data loading properly across all tabs
Bug fix documentation and test coverage
success_criteria: All dashboard tabs are clickable and functional
Data loads properly in all sections
Playwright tests cover all critical user flows
Dashboard passes all automated health checks
current_issues: Tabs not clickable - JavaScript event handling issue
No data loading - potential WebSocket or API connection problem
Dashboard monitoring critical for agent coordination

context.current_status: BROKEN - tabs and data loading not working
